titles.title: Integrated English Literacy and Civics Education Nationwide Act
To amend the term State to include outlying areas for purposes of the Integrated English Literacy and Civics Education program.
Integrated English Literacy and Civics Education Nationwide Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Integrated English Literacy and Civics Education Nationwide Act
This bill makes annual Department of Education grants available to American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and Palau for integrated English literacy and civics education to prepare English language learners for employment.
